00019 /*
00020  * libcfs/libcfs/utils/param.c
00021  *
00022  * This code handles user interaction with the configuration interface
00023  * to the Lustre file system to fine tune it.
00024  */
00025 #include <errno.h>
00026 #include <fcntl.h>
00027 #include <glob.h>
00028 #include <stdarg.h>
00029 #include <stdio.h>
00030 #include <stdlib.h>
00031 #include <string.h>
00032 #include <unistd.h>
00033 #include <linux/limits.h>
00034 #include <libcfs/util/string.h>
00035 
00056 int
00057 cfs_get_param_paths(glob_t *paths, const char *pattern, ...)
00058 {
00059         char path[PATH_MAX] = "{/sys/{fs,kernel/debug}/{lnet,lustre}/,"
00060                                "/proc/{fs,sys}/{lnet,lustre}/}";
00061         size_t len = strlen(path);
00062         char buf[PATH_MAX];
00063         va_list args;
00064         int rc;
00065 
00066         va_start(args, pattern);
00067         rc = vsnprintf(buf, sizeof(buf), pattern, args);
00068         va_end(args);
00069         if (rc < 0) {
00070                 return rc;
00071         } else if (rc >= sizeof(buf)) {
00072                 errno = EINVAL;
00073                 return -1;
00074         }
00075         len += rc;
00076 
00077         if (strlcat(path, buf, sizeof(path)) != len) {
00078                 errno = E2BIG;
00079                 return -1;
00080         }
00081 
00082         rc = glob(path, GLOB_BRACE, NULL, paths);
00083         if (rc != 0) {
00084                 switch (rc) {
00085                 case GLOB_NOSPACE:
00086                         errno = ENOMEM;
00087                         break;
00088                 case GLOB_ABORTED:
00089                         errno = ENODEV;
00090                         break;
00091                 case GLOB_NOMATCH:
00092                 default:
00093                         errno = ENOENT;
00094                         break;
00095                 }
00096                 rc = -1;
00097         }
00098 
00099         return rc;
00100 }
